Name: CareTeamStatus
Title: CareTeamStatus
Descriptino: Indicates the status of the care team.

Name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity

Name: MedicationAdministration Status Codes
Title: Medication administration  status  codes
Descriptino: MedicationAdministration Status Codes

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: PublicationStatus
Title: PublicationStatus
Descriptino: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

Name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

Name: AddressUseVSTWLTC
Title: 地址用途擴展值集

Name: ConditionSeverityVSTWLTC
Title: 疾病嚴重度擴展值集
Descriptino: 用以表述疾病嚴重度之擴展值集，包含疾病嚴重度之描述內容。配合身心障礙手冊障礙程度分級，包含輕度、中度、重度、極重度等代碼。

Name: EconomyStatusVSTWLTC
Title: 個案經濟狀況值集
Descriptino: 用以表述個案經濟狀況之值集，包含個案經濟狀況之描述內容。

Name: EducationStatusVSTWLTC
Title: 教育程度值集
Descriptino: 用以表述教育程度之值集，包含教育程度之描述內容。

Name: GoalDescriptionVSTWLTC
Title: 照顧目標描述值集
Descriptino: 照顧目標的描述值集，用以表述長期照顧情境中涉及之照顧目標描述內容。本值集比照 US Core Goal Profile 中的 description 元素定義，引用 SNOMED CT 與 LOINC 等術語系統。

Name: RelationshipTypeVSTWLTC
